title: Les Compagnons de Jehu
overview: The disorders of the French Revolution have not yet calmed down when a mysterious brotherhood "the Company of Jehu" conspires, at the time of the Directory, to restore King Louis XVIII to the throne and chase the usurper Bonaparte. The latter gives to Roland de Montrevel the mission to get him rid of this threat. The chief of Jehu's Companions, Morgan, will die there after stagecoach attacks, pursuits and duels.
